name: White Bean Cranberry Hummus Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: cannelloni bean, tahini, lemon, dried cranberry, fresh rosemary, olive oil, salt, water, sweet cracker
recipeIngredient: dried cranberries 1/2 cup chopped (more for garnish)
fresh rosemary 1 tsp finally chopped (save a sprig for garnish)
recipeInstructionSteps: Combine all ingredients in a food processor.
Blend until smooth adding small amounts of oil and water until desired consistency is achieved.
Add extra olive oil, dried cranberry, and a sprig of rosemary to garnish!
Eat with sweet crackers or fresh vegetables.
